author: Anonymous Poet
title: Problem Bank Questions
question: Why aren't the problem bank questions being properly graded by auto grader? It just gives 100% to everything I submit, even if it is obviously the wrong answer.
instructor_answer:
try to treat the problem bank questions as exam questions for now. Use the skills you've learned to make sure you understand why you did things the way you did on the file.
Autograder is a great way to learn, but you also need to be able to explain and defend your code to yourself or to others
